conversation.content: So I'm on lunch. Got maybe ten minutes. Order's not here yet?
Oh okay. Quick check then. Um... account number? Or order? Either works. Let me just—system's being slow today.
It's—wait no, that's Tuesday. Wednesday? I think Wednesday delivery.
Right right. Wednesday. Hmm, let me see what's... okay so order WED-4472-BC shows delivered. Yesterday actually. At 3:47 PM.
No that's—I mean Monday. Sorry. Brain's not working.
No worries! Monday then. Er... nothing Monday though. Could it be—what's the word—scheduled? For later? Like upcoming?
I probably wrote it down wrong. Always do this kind of thing.
Hey no. Don't worry. Look we're gonna—actually wait. Found something. Order MON-8891-XJ. Processing since March 14th. That's... huh. Three weeks?
Three weeks? So basically it's just... stuck?
Yeah that's. Not right. At all. Okay so—no actually—let me escalate. Status code shows ERR-091. Never seen that before.
Maybe I filled something out wrong? Address or sort of... payment?
Nope. Your info's perfect. This is... mmm... warehouse issue. Facility 7B. Let me just—I'm getting my supervisor. One sec.
But I only have like five min—sorry, four minutes left.
Got it got it. Okay look. Here's what I'm doing. Canceling that one. Reprocessing. New order TUE-2234-QR. Overnight shipping. No charge.
Wait so Tuesday—no that's today. Next Tuesday?
Tomorrow actually! Well... technically Wednesday morning. By 10 AM. Guaranteed. Tracking starts in about two hours. Check email.
I think my email's wrong though. Ends in gmail? Or maybe hotmail?
Shows jones447@gmail. Sound right? Actually—hold on—also jones.mary@hotmail. Both on file. I'll... er... send to both.
Oh good. Yeah. Sorry for all the confusion and like... yeah.
Please! Nothing to apologize for. System failed you. Completely. Reference number APL-7792-SS if anything goes wrong. Which it won't.

scenario: impatient because they're calling during their lunch break and have limited time
